description: Leyton Orient's hopes of closing in on the League One play-off spots are dented by a home draw against struggling Wigan.
title: Leyton Orient 0-0 Wigan Athletic
title_page: Leyton Orient 0-0 Wigan Athletic - BBC Sport
maintext:
Leyton Orient have won just one of their last nine league games against Wigan Athletic (D2 L6), though that sole victory did come in the reverse fixture in December last year (2-0).
Wigan Athletic have lost just two of their 10 away league games against Leyton Orient (W2 D6), though have kept just one clean sheet in that time.
Leyton Orient have lost two of their last three home league games (W1), as many defeats as across their prior 12 outings at Brisbane Road combined (W9 D1).
Wigan have lost their last three league games against sides from London, last enduring a longer losing run against sides from the capital between December 2006 and February 2007 in the Premier League.
